name: Crop Rush
description:
A game made for the Ludum Dare 52 game jam.

Crop Rush is a short puzzle game in which the player has to harvest all the crops in the least amount of moves possible. The game is inspired by Club Penguin's Thin Ice minigame.

It was made over the span of three days, with the main theme of the game jam being "Harvest".

A WebGL build is provided, however Windows and Linux standalone builds are also available for download. 

Only mouse and keyboard is supported (sorry controller users!).
Both WASD/Arrow Keys work.

Thank you for playing, please enjoy!
